name: Pesto-Stuffed Chicken Breast
author: My Hot Southern Mess
summary: A quick and easy keto pesto-stuffed chicken breast recipe.
ingredients: 4 ounces mozzarella cheese, cut into 4 slices
directions: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with aluminum foil
Cut a pocket into each chicken breast
Evenly stuff pocket of each chicken breast with 1 slice mozzarella cheese and 1 tablespoon pesto
Beat together eggs and remaining 1 tablespoon pesto in a bowl
Place Parmesan cheese in a shallow dish
Dip chicken in egg mixture and then coat with Parmesan cheese
Place coated chicken breast onto the prepared baking sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until chicken is no longer pink in the center and juices are running clear, 20 to 30 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C)
